column2: "You gave us quite a scare, falling out of the sky like that! Are you okay? No injuries?"
"That's strange. Manon seemed to know a bunch of things that we didn't..."
"Even among the Meteorn, I guess everyone's got different circumstances."
"Well, that's good! Didn't forget your name at least, right?"
"Anyways, it's a pleasure to meet you!"
